achievements.title: Certifications and Courses
achievements.description: Here are some certifications and courses I have completed.

list.title: High School Diploma
list.description: High School Diploma in Social Sciences, focusing on economics, psychology, sociology, and history.

list.title: FullStack Bootcamp 750 Hours
list.description: React, Node.js, Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, testing (Jest, Vitest), and security (JWT, OAuth2.0). Focused on best practices and tools like Git and Vscode.
